screens.title: 布局组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "布局组件 Layout"

    [CARD: grid_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Grid 网格布局")
      [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "Columns: 2/3/4, Gap: SM/MD/LG"
      [GRID: g1]
        { Columns: "3", Gap: "MD" }
        [CARD: c1] CONTENT: "Grid Item 1"
        [CARD: c2] CONTENT: "Grid Item 2"
        [CARD: c3] CONTENT: "Grid Item 3"

    [CARD: flex_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Flex 弹性布局")
      [TEXT: desc] CONTENT: "Direction: Row/Col, Justify: Start/Center/Between"
      [FLEX: f1]
        { Direction: "Row", Gap: "MD", Justify: "Between" }
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "Flex Item 1"
        [BADGE: b2] CONTENT: "Flex Item 2"
        [BADGE: b3] CONTENT: "Flex Item 3"

    [CARD: stack_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Stack 堆叠布局")
      [STACK: s1]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "Stack Item 1"
        [BADGE: b2] CONTENT: "Stack Item 2"
        [BADGE: b3] CONTENT: "Stack Item 3"

    [CARD: hero_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Hero 主视觉区")
      [HERO: h1]
        { Align: "Center" }
        [HEADING: ht] CONTENT: "Hero 标题"
        [TEXT: hd] CONTENT: "Hero 描述文字，用于页面主视觉区域"

screens.title: 导航组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "导航组件 Navigation"

    [CARD: tabs_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Tabs 选项卡")
      [TABS: tabs1]
        [CARD: tab1]
          ATTR: Title("选项卡 1")
          [TEXT: c1] CONTENT: "选项卡 1 的内容"
        [CARD: tab2]
          ATTR: Title("选项卡 2")
          [TEXT: c2] CONTENT: "选项卡 2 的内容"
        [CARD: tab3]
          ATTR: Title("选项卡 3")
          [TEXT: c3] CONTENT: "选项卡 3 的内容"

    [CARD: breadcrumb_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Breadcrumb 面包屑")
      [BREADCRUMB: bc1]
        [TEXT: p1] CONTENT: "首页"
        [TEXT: p2] CONTENT: "产品"
        [TEXT: p3] CONTENT: "详情"

    [CARD: stepper_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Stepper 步骤条")
      [STEPPER: st1]
        [CARD: s1]
          ATTR: Title("步骤 1")
          [TEXT: d1] CONTENT: "填写信息"
        [CARD: s2]
          ATTR: Title("步骤 2")
          [TEXT: d2] CONTENT: "确认订单"
        [CARD: s3]
          ATTR: Title("步骤 3")
          [TEXT: d3] CONTENT: "支付完成"

screens.title: 数据展示
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "数据展示 Data Display"

    [GRID: stats]
      { Columns: "4", Gap: "MD" }
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s1]
        ATTR: Title("总用户"), Icon("Users")
        CONTENT: "12,345"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s2]
        ATTR: Title("订单数"), Icon("ShoppingCart")
        CONTENT: "8,901"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s3]
        ATTR: Title("收入"), Icon("DollarSign")
        CONTENT: "¥99,999"
      [STATISTIC_CARD: s4]
        ATTR: Title("增长率"), Icon("TrendingUp")
        CONTENT: "+15.3%"

    [CARD: card_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Card 卡片")
      [GRID: cards]
        { Columns: "3", Gap: "MD" }
        [CARD: c1]
          ATTR: Title("基础卡片")
          CONTENT: "卡片内容描述"
        [CARD: c2]
          ATTR: Title("带图标"), Icon("Star")
          CONTENT: "带图标的卡片"
        [CARD: c3]
          ATTR: Title("带操作")
          [FLEX: actions]
            { Gap: "SM" }
            [BUTTON: b1] ATTR: Size("SM") CONTENT: "确认"
            [BUTTON: b2] ATTR: Size("SM"), Variant("outline") CONTENT: "取消"

    [CARD: table_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Table 表格")
      [TABLE: t1]
        [FLEX: header]
          [TEXT: h1] CONTENT: "姓名"
          [TEXT: h2] CONTENT: "年龄"
          [TEXT: h3] CONTENT: "城市"
        [FLEX: row1]
          [TEXT: d1] CONTENT: "张三"
          [TEXT: d2] CONTENT: "28"
          [TEXT: d3] CONTENT: "北京"
        [FLEX: row2]
          [TEXT: d4] CONTENT: "李四"
          [TEXT: d5] CONTENT: "32"
          [TEXT: d6] CONTENT: "上海"

    [CARD: list_demo]
      ATTR: Title("List 列表")
      [LIST: l1]
        [TEXT: i1] CONTENT: "列表项 1"
        [TEXT: i2] CONTENT: "列表项 2"
        [TEXT: i3] CONTENT: "列表项 3"

    [CARD: timeline_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Timeline 时间线")
      [TIMELINE: tl1]
        [CARD: t1]
          ATTR: Title("2024-01"), Icon("Flag")
          [TEXT: d1] CONTENT: "项目启动"
        [CARD: t2]
          ATTR: Title("2024-03"), Icon("Code")
          [TEXT: d2] CONTENT: "开发完成"
        [CARD: t3]
          ATTR: Title("2024-06"), Icon("Rocket")
          [TEXT: d3] CONTENT: "正式上线"

    [CARD: accordion_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Accordion 折叠面板")
      [ACCORDION: ac1]
        [CARD: a1]
          ATTR: Title("面板 1")
          [TEXT: c1] CONTENT: "面板 1 的内容详情"
        [CARD: a2]
          ATTR: Title("面板 2")
          [TEXT: c2] CONTENT: "面板 2 的内容详情"
        [CARD: a3]
          ATTR: Title("面板 3")
          [TEXT: c3] CONTENT: "面板 3 的内容详情"

screens.title: 表单组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "表单组件 Forms"

    [CARD: button_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Button 按钮")
      [STACK: btns]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [TEXT: label1] CONTENT: "变体 Variant:"
        [FLEX: row1]
          { Gap: "SM" }
          [BUTTON: b1] ATTR: Variant("default") CONTENT: "Default"
          [BUTTON: b2] ATTR: Variant("secondary") CONTENT: "Secondary"
          [BUTTON: b3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "Outline"
          [BUTTON: b4] ATTR: Variant("ghost") CONTENT: "Ghost"
          [BUTTON: b5] ATTR: Variant("destructive") CONTENT: "Destructive"
        [TEXT: label2] CONTENT: "尺寸 Size:"
        [FLEX: row2]
          { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
          [BUTTON: s1] ATTR: Size("SM") CONTENT: "Small"
          [BUTTON: s2] ATTR: Size("MD") CONTENT: "Medium"
          [BUTTON: s3] ATTR: Size("LG") CONTENT: "Large"
        [TEXT: label3] CONTENT: "带图标:"
        [FLEX: row3]
          { Gap: "SM" }
          [BUTTON: i1] ATTR: Icon("Plus") CONTENT: "添加"
          [BUTTON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Download") CONTENT: "下载"
          [BUTTON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Settings"), Variant("outline") CONTENT: "设置"

    [CARD: input_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Input 输入框")
      [STACK: inputs]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [FLEX: r1]
          { Gap: "MD" }
          [STACK: f1]
            [LABEL: l1] CONTENT: "用户名"
            [INPUT: i1] ATTR: Placeholder("请输入用户名")
          [STACK: f2]
            [LABEL: l2] CONTENT: "密码"
            [INPUT: i2] ATTR: Placeholder("请输入密码")
        [FLEX: r2]
          { Gap: "MD" }
          [STACK: f3]
            [LABEL: l3] CONTENT: "禁用状态"
            [INPUT: i3] ATTR: Placeholder("禁用"), Disabled("true")

    [CARD: checkbox_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Checkbox & Switch 复选框和开关")
      [FLEX: checks]
        { Gap: "LG" }
        [STACK: s1]
          { Gap: "SM" }
          [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "Checkbox:"
          [CHECKBOX: c1] ATTR: Label("选项 A")
          [CHECKBOX: c2] ATTR: Label("选项 B")
          [CHECKBOX: c3] ATTR: Label("禁用"), Disabled("true")
        [STACK: s2]
          { Gap: "SM" }
          [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "Switch:"
          [SWITCH: sw1] ATTR: Label("开启通知")
          [SWITCH: sw2] ATTR: Label("深色模式")
          [SWITCH: sw3] ATTR: Label("禁用"), Disabled("true")

    [CARD: select_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Select 选择器")
      [FLEX: selects]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [STACK: s1]
          [LABEL: l1] CONTENT: "城市"
          [SELECT: sel1]
            ATTR: Placeholder("请选择城市")
            [TEXT: o1] CONTENT: "北京"
            [TEXT: o2] CONTENT: "上海"
            [TEXT: o3] CONTENT: "广州"

    [CARD: slider_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Slider 滑块")
      [STACK: sliders]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [LABEL: l1] CONTENT: "音量"
        [SLIDER: sl1]
        [LABEL: l2] CONTENT: "亮度"
        [SLIDER: sl2]

screens.title: 反馈组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "反馈组件 Feedback"

    [CARD: alert_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Alert 警告提示")
      [STACK: alerts]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [ALERT: a1]
          ATTR: Variant("default"), Title("提示")
          CONTENT: "这是一条默认提示信息"
        [ALERT: a2]
          ATTR: Variant("destructive"), Title("错误")
          CONTENT: "操作失败，请重试"

    [CARD: badge_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Badge 徽章")
      [FLEX: badges]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "默认"
        [BADGE: b2] ATTR: Variant("secondary") CONTENT: "次要"
        [BADGE: b3] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "边框"
        [BADGE: b4] ATTR: Variant("destructive") CONTENT: "危险"

    [CARD: progress_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Progress 进度条")
      [STACK: progress]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [TEXT: l1] CONTENT: "下载进度: 30%"
        [PROGRESS: p1] ATTR: Value("30")
        [TEXT: l2] CONTENT: "上传进度: 70%"
        [PROGRESS: p2] ATTR: Value("70")
        [TEXT: l3] CONTENT: "完成: 100%"
        [PROGRESS: p3] ATTR: Value("100")

    [CARD: skeleton_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Skeleton 骨架屏")
      [STACK: skeletons]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [SKELETON: sk1]
        [SKELETON: sk2]
        [SKELETON: sk3]

    [CARD: avatar_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Avatar 头像")
      [FLEX: avatars]
        { Gap: "MD", Align: "Center" }
        [AVATAR: av1] ATTR: Fallback("张")
        [AVATAR: av2] ATTR: Fallback("李")
        [AVATAR: av3] ATTR: Fallback("王")

screens.title: 文本组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "文本组件 Typography"

    [CARD: heading_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Heading 标题")
      [STACK: headings]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [HEADING: h1] ATTR: Size("XL") CONTENT: "XL 超大标题"
        [HEADING: h2] ATTR: Size("LG") CONTENT: "LG 大标题"
        [HEADING: h3] ATTR: Size("MD") CONTENT: "MD 中标题"
        [HEADING: h4] ATTR: Size("SM") CONTENT: "SM 小标题"
        [HEADING: h5] ATTR: Size("XS") CONTENT: "XS 超小标题"

    [CARD: text_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Text 文本")
      [STACK: texts]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [TEXT: t1] ATTR: Size("LG") CONTENT: "大号文本 Large Text"
        [TEXT: t2] ATTR: Size("MD") CONTENT: "中号文本 Medium Text (默认)"
        [TEXT: t3] ATTR: Size("SM") CONTENT: "小号文本 Small Text"
        [TEXT: t4] ATTR: Size("XS") CONTENT: "超小文本 Extra Small Text"

    [CARD: align_demo]
      ATTR: Title("文本对齐")
      [STACK: aligns]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [TEXT: a1] ATTR: Align("Left") CONTENT: "左对齐文本"
        [TEXT: a2] ATTR: Align("Center") CONTENT: "居中对齐文本"
        [TEXT: a3] ATTR: Align("Right") CONTENT: "右对齐文本"

    [CARD: code_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Code 代码")
      [CODE: c1]
        CONTENT: "const greeting = 'Hello, Stitch!';\nconsole.log(greeting);"

    [CARD: quote_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Quote 引用")
      [QUOTE: q1]
        CONTENT: "设计不仅仅是外观和感觉，设计是它如何运作的。— 史蒂夫·乔布斯"

    [CARD: icon_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Icon 图标")
      [FLEX: icons]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("Home")
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Settings")
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("User")
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("Search")
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Heart")
        [ICON: i7] ATTR: Icon("Star")
        [ICON: i8] ATTR: Icon("Mail")

    [CARD: link_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Link 链接")
      [FLEX: links]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [LINK: l1] ATTR: Href("#") CONTENT: "普通链接"
        [LINK: l2] ATTR: Href("https://example.com"), External("true") CONTENT: "外部链接"

    [CARD: divider_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Divider 分隔线")
      [STACK: dividers]
        { Gap: "MD" }
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "上方内容"
        [DIVIDER: d1]
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "下方内容"

screens.title: 其他组件
screens.dsl:
[FLEX: layout]
  { Direction: "Row", Gap: "None" }

  [SIDEBAR: nav]
    [HEADING: logo] CONTENT: "组件测试"
    [NAV: menu]
      [FLEX: n1]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i1] ATTR: Icon("LayoutGrid")
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "布局组件"
      [FLEX: n2]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i2] ATTR: Icon("Navigation")
        [TEXT: t2] CONTENT: "导航组件"
      [FLEX: n3]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i3] ATTR: Icon("Table")
        [TEXT: t3] CONTENT: "数据展示"
      [FLEX: n4]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i4] ATTR: Icon("FormInput")
        [TEXT: t4] CONTENT: "表单组件"
      [FLEX: n5]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i5] ATTR: Icon("Bell")
        [TEXT: t5] CONTENT: "反馈组件"
      [FLEX: n6]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i6] ATTR: Icon("Type")
        [TEXT: t6] CONTENT: "文本组件"
      [FLEX: n7]
        { Gap: "SM", Align: "Center" }
        [ICON: i7] ATTR: Icon("MoreHorizontal")
        [TEXT: t7] CONTENT: "其他组件"

  [SECTION: main]
    [HEADING: title]
      ATTR: Size("XL")
      CONTENT: "其他组件 Extra"

    [CARD: container_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Container 容器")
      [CONTAINER: c1]
        [TEXT: t1] CONTENT: "Container 是一个居中的容器，限制最大宽度"

    [CARD: columns_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Columns 列布局")
      [COLUMNS: cols1]
        { Columns: "2" }
        [CARD: c1] CONTENT: "左列"
        [CARD: c2] CONTENT: "右列"

    [CARD: split_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Split 分割布局")
      [SPLIT: sp1]
        [CARD: left] CONTENT: "左侧区域"
        [CARD: right] CONTENT: "右侧区域"

    [CARD: rows_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Rows 行布局")
      [ROWS: r1]
        { Gap: "SM" }
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "Row 1"
        [BADGE: b2] CONTENT: "Row 2"
        [BADGE: b3] CONTENT: "Row 3"

    [CARD: center_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Center 居中")
      [CENTER: c1]
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "居中内容"

    [CARD: spacer_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Spacer 间隔")
      [FLEX: f1]
        { Direction: "Row" }
        [BADGE: b1] CONTENT: "左边"
        [SPACER: sp1]
        [BADGE: b2] CONTENT: "右边"

    [CARD: header_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Header 页头")
      [HEADER: h1]
        [TEXT: logo] CONTENT: "Logo"
        [NAV: nav1]
          [TEXT: n1] CONTENT: "首页"
          [TEXT: n2] CONTENT: "产品"
          [TEXT: n3] CONTENT: "关于"

    [CARD: footer_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Footer 页脚")
      [FOOTER: f1]
        [TEXT: copy] CONTENT: "© 2024 Company. All rights reserved."

    [CARD: statistic_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Statistic 统计")
      [FLEX: stats]
        { Gap: "LG" }
        [STATISTIC: st1]
          ATTR: Title("活跃用户")
          CONTENT: "1,234"
        [STATISTIC: st2]
          ATTR: Title("总收入")
          CONTENT: "¥56,789"

    [CARD: image_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Image 图片")
      [IMAGE: img1]
        ATTR: Src("https://placehold.co/400x200"), Alt("示例图片")

    [CARD: radio_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Radio 单选框")
      [RADIO: r1]
        [TEXT: o1] CONTENT: "选项 A"
        [TEXT: o2] CONTENT: "选项 B"
        [TEXT: o3] CONTENT: "选项 C"

    [CARD: form_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Form 表单")
      [FORM: f1]
        [LABEL: l1] CONTENT: "姓名"
        [INPUT: i1] ATTR: Placeholder("请输入姓名")
        [LABEL: l2] CONTENT: "邮箱"
        [INPUT: i2] ATTR: Placeholder("请输入邮箱")
        [BUTTON: submit] CONTENT: "提交"

    [CARD: tooltip_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Tooltip 提示")
      [TOOLTIP: tt1]
        ATTR: Content("这是提示内容")
        [BUTTON: b1] CONTENT: "悬停查看提示"

    [CARD: empty_demo]
      ATTR: Title("EmptyState 空状态")
      [EMPTY_STATE: es1]
        ATTR: Title("暂无数据"), Icon("Inbox")
        CONTENT: "当前没有任何数据，请稍后再试"

    [CARD: modal_demo]
      ATTR: Title("Modal 对话框")
      [MODAL: m1]
        ATTR: Title("确认操作"), Description("您确定要执行此操作吗？")
        [BUTTON: confirm] CONTENT: "确认"
        [BUTTON: cancel] ATTR: Variant("outline") CONTENT: "取消"
